name: Smash the Ritual
description:
An Atheist who wants to destroy all other rituals that could convert him. He wants to stop them all!. Game made for Global Game Jam 2016

Game for two local players.

Credits:

Game Designer - Sergio Rodriguez Programmers - Juan Manuel Garcia Sebastian Nazarian Artists- Barbara D'aversa Daniel Gorosito Federico Boero Music - Andrés Raffo
